title: Complete Wellness Package
PackageName: Assure Complete Wellness Package for Man
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Assure Complete Wellness Package for Man is a comprehensive health checkup for men. It includes tests for various parameters, including blood sugar, cholesterol, prostate-specific antigen (PSA), and more.
WhoIsItFor: Ideal for men of all ages who want to monitor their overall health and well-being.

title: Thyroid Care
PreTestInfo: Fasting is not required for this test.
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Assure Thyroid Care package focuses on assessing thyroid function with tests for key thyroid hormones.
WhoIsItFor: Recommended for individuals with known or suspected thyroid issues.

title: Immunity Check Panel
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Assure Well Immunity Check Panel is designed to assess immunity levels and overall health with a focus on key markers.
WhoIsItFor: Suitable for individuals interested in evaluating their immune system and general well-being.

title: Diabetes Profile
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Diabetes Profile package is designed for individuals at risk of or with diabetes. It includes tests to assess blood sugar levels, cholesterol, kidney function, and more.
WhoIsItFor: Recommended for individuals with diabetes or those at risk of developing it.

title: Diabetes Profile
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Diabetes Profile Extended package offers a comprehensive assessment of diabetes-related markers, kidney function, and more.
WhoIsItFor: Suitable for individuals with diabetes or those requiring detailed diabetes-related tests.

title: Diabetes Screen
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Diabetes Screen package is a basic assessment of diabetes-related markers to check blood sugar levels and overall health.
WhoIsItFor: Ideal for individuals looking for a simple check of their diabetes-related markers.

title: Fever
PreTestInfo: Fasting is not required for this test.
TestInfoDate: Test is run daily, and the report is available the same day.
TestDetails: The Fever Cure package is designed to evaluate fever-related conditions, including tests for malaria, typhoid, dengue, and more.
WhoIsItFor: Suitable for individuals with fever-like symptoms or those traveling to areas with a higher risk of fever-related illnesses.

title: Fever
